00014 
00015 #include <stdio.h>
00016 #include <stdlib.h>
00017 #include "Lgm/Lgm_MagModelInfo.h"
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021 int Lgm_TraceToMinBSurf( Lgm_Vector *u, Lgm_Vector *v, double Htry, double tol, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00022 
00023     Lgm_Vector  u_scale;
00024     double      Htry_max, Hdid, Hnext, Hmin, Hmax, s=0.0, sgn, r2;
00025     double      Sa, Sb, Sc, s2, d1, d2;
00026     double      Ba, Bb, Bc, B, B2, R;
00027     Lgm_Vector  Btmp;
00028     Lgm_Vector  Pa, Pb, Pc, P, P2;
00029     int         done, reset=TRUE;
00030 
00031 
00032 
00033     Info->Trace_s = 0.0;
00034     Hmax = 0.5;
00035 //    Hmin = 0.00001;
00036     Hmin = 1e-7;
00037     u_scale.x =  100.0;  u_scale.y = 100.0; u_scale.z = 100.0;
00038 
00039 
00040     /*
00041      *  Bracket the minimum. We want to find two points along
00042      *  the field line such that the location of |B|_min is
00043      *  gauranteed to lie between them. To do this, we need to find
00044      *  three points; Pa, Pb, and Pc such that;
00045      *
00046      *           Pc > Pb > Pa
00047      *
00048      *      and  |B( Pa )|   >   |B( Pb )|
00049      *      and  |B( Pc )|   >   |B( Pb )|
00050      *
00051      *
00052      */
00053 
00054     done = FALSE; Sa = Sb = Sc = 0.0;
00055 
00056     /* 
00057      *  Set the start point, Pa and |B(Pa)|;
00058      *  I.e., Pa, Ba, Sa
00059      */
00060     Pa   = *u;
00061     R    = Lgm_Magnitude( &Pa );
00062     Info->Bfield( &Pa, &Btmp, Info );
00063     Ba   = Lgm_Magnitude( &Btmp );
00064     Sa   = 0.0;
00065 
00066 
00067     /*
00068      *  Get an initial Htry that is safe -- i.e. start off slowly
00069      *  We dont really know where we are, so be conservative on the first try.
00070      *  If Lgm_MagStep() gives back an Hnext thats higher, we'll crank Htry up then...
00071      */
00072     Htry = 0.9*(R-1.0);        // This computes Htry as 90% of the distance to the Earth's surface (could be small if we are already close!)
00073     if (Htry > 0.01) Htry = 0.01; // If its bigger than 0.01 reset it to 0.01 -- to be safe.
00074 
00075     
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079     /* 
00080      *  Determine which way to go....
00081      *  Set Pb and |B(Pb)|.
00082      *  Try a step up the field line. If that doesnt give us 
00083      *  a |B| less than Ba, then try down the field line.
00084      *  Use a fairly small stepsize to start with. 
00085      *  This determined which direction we should move in (via value of sgn)
00086      */
00087     P = Pa; reset = TRUE;
00088     Lgm_MagStep( &P, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, -1.0, &s, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00089     Info->Trace_s -= Hdid;
00090     Info->Bfield( &P, &Btmp, Info );
00091     B = Lgm_Magnitude( &Btmp );
00092 
00093     if ( B < Ba ) {
00094 
00095         Pb  = P;
00096         Bb  = B;
00097         Sb  = Hdid;
00098         sgn = -1.0;     // We should move in direction opposite the field direction.
00099 
00100     } else {
00101 
00102         P2 = Pa; reset = TRUE;
00103         Lgm_MagStep( &P2, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, 1.0, &s2, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00104         Info->Bfield( &P2, &Btmp, Info );
00105         B2 = Lgm_Magnitude( &Btmp );
00106 
00107         if ( B2 < Ba ) {
00108             Pb  = P2; 
00109             Bb  = B2; 
00110             Sb  = Hdid;
00111             sgn = 1.0;      // We should move in direction with the field direction.
00112         } else { 
00113             /*
00114              *  We must have already bracketed the min.
00115              */
00116             Pb   = P;  Bb   = B;  Sb   = s;
00117             Pc   = P2; Bc   = B2; Sc   = s2;
00118             sgn  = 1.0;
00119             done = TRUE;
00120         }
00121 
00122     }
00123 
00124 
00125 
00126 
00127 
00128 
00129 
00130 
00131 
00132     /*
00133      *  Keep stepping along the field line until we have a bracket.
00134      */
00135     while (!done) {
00136 
00137         P = Pb;
00138         Lgm_MagStep( &P, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, sgn, &s, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00139         Info->Bfield( &P, &Btmp, Info );
00140         B = Lgm_Magnitude( &Btmp );
00141 
00142         if ( B < Bb ) {
00143             Pa = Pb; Ba = Bb; Sa = Sb;
00144             Pb = P;  Bb = B;  Sb = Sa + Hdid; 
00145                 if (   (P.x > Info->OpenLimit_xMax) || (P.x < Info->OpenLimit_xMin) || (P.y > Info->OpenLimit_yMax) || (P.y < Info->OpenLimit_yMin)
00146                     || (P.z > Info->OpenLimit_zMax) || (P.z < Info->OpenLimit_zMin) ) {
00147                 /*
00148                  *  Open FL!
00149                  */
00150                 v->x = v->y = v->z = 0.0;
00151                 return(0);
00152             } else {
00153                 Htry = Hnext;   // adaptively reset Htry
00154 
00155                 /*
00156                  *  Dont attempt steps bigger than 0.25*distance to Earths surface
00157                  *  Also respect Hmin and Hmax.
00158                  */
00159                 R = Lgm_Magnitude( &P );
00160                 Htry_max = 0.25*fabs(R-1.0);
00161                 if (Htry > Htry_max)  Htry = Htry_max;
00162                 if      (Htry < Hmin) Htry = Hmin;
00163                 else if (Htry > Hmax) Htry = Hmax;
00164             }
00165         } else {
00166             Pc = P;  Bc = B; Sc = Sb + Hdid;
00167             done = TRUE;
00168         }
00169 
00170 
00171     }
00172     
00173 
00174 
00175 
00176 
00177 
00178     /*
00179      *  We have a bracket. Now go in for the kill.
00180      *  Use golden-section search to converge toward minimum.
00181      *  (Sa, Sb, Sc) are the distances of the triple points along
00182      *  the FL. 
00183      */
00184     done = FALSE;
00185     while (!done) {
00186 
00187         d1 = Sb - Sa;
00188         d2 = Sc - Sb;
00189         if ( (Sc-Sa) < tol ) {
00190             done = TRUE;
00191         } else if ( d1 > d2 ) {
00192 
00193             P = Pa; Htry = 0.381966011*d1;
00194             Lgm_MagStep( &P, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, sgn, &s, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00195             Info->Bfield( &P, &Btmp, Info );
00196             B = Lgm_Magnitude( &Btmp );
00197 
00198             if ( B < Bb ) {
00199                 Pb = P; Bb = B; Sb = Sa + Hdid;
00200             } else {
00201                 Pa = P; Ba = B; Sa += Hdid;
00202             }
00203         
00204         } else {
00205 
00206             P = Pb; Htry = 0.381966011*d2;
00207             Lgm_MagStep( &P, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, sgn, &s, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00208             Info->Bfield( &P, &Btmp, Info );
00209             B = Lgm_Magnitude( &Btmp );
00210 
00211             if ( B < Bb ) {
00212                 Pb = P; Bb = B; Sb += Hdid;
00213             } else {
00214                 Pc = P; Bc = B; Sc = Sb + Hdid;
00215             }
00216 
00217         }
00218 
00219     }
00220 
00221 
00222     /*
00223      *  Take location of the Min-B surface to be Pb.
00224      */
00225     *v = Pb;
00226 
00227     Info->Trace_s = Sb;
00228 
00229 
00230     return( 1 );
00231 
00232 }
00233 
00234 /*
00235  *   $id$
00236  */
